attributes.action: British Parliamentary needs to take seriously the BBC breaking of their charter.
attributes.background: MSM have continued the anti-Brexit bias, not least of all the BBC. Calls for cancelling the TV licence fee have continually been ignored. This must stop and the people's demands must be taken more seriously than the needs of a corrupt organisation.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like the TV Licence fee to be abolished, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200239
